name: Alec Bradley - Medalist - Toro
additionalNotes: Alec Bradley Medalist is mellower than other cigars in the brand’s portfolio thanks to a unique shade-grown Honduran wrapper and a balanced core of Nicaraguan and Honduran long-fillers underneath. A hint of citrus blesses the palate while woody notes of vanilla, nuts, and leather layer the taste buds with a mix of sweet and spicy flavor. A creamy and easygoing finish characterizes an old-school Alec Bradley blend in a collection of thick and popular shapes. Save big on a classic from Alec Bradley that’s been around more than decade.
